briefdescription.para: Gets a Color object that represents the background color for the fill.
Gets a fill type.
Gets or sets a Color object that represents the foreground color for the fill.
Gets or sets the angle of the gradient fill.
Gets a collection of GradientStop objects for the fill.
Gets the gradient style GradientStyle for the fill.
Gets the gradient variant GradientVariant for the fill.
Gets the raw bytes of the fill texture or pattern.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is null.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the specified fill as a value between 0.0 (clear) and 1.0 (opaque).
Gets a PatternType for the fill.
Gets a PresetTexture for the fill.
Gets whether the fill rotates with the specified object.
Gets or sets the alignment for tile texture fill.
Gets the degree of transparency of the specified fill as a value between 0.0 (opaque) and 1.0 (clear).
Gets or sets value that is true if the formatting applied to this instance, is visible.
Sets the specified fill to a one-color gradient.

memberdef.argsstring: (System::Drawing::Color color, Aspose::Words::Drawing::GradientStyle style, Aspose::Words::Drawing::GradientVariant variant, double degree)
memberdef.name: OneColorGradient

briefdescription.para: Sets the specified fill to a one-color gradient using the specified color.

briefdescription.para: Sets the specified fill to a two-color gradient.
Represents fill formatting for an object.

detaileddescription.para: Use the Fill or Fill property to access fill properties of an object. You do not create instances of the Fill class directly.
